table.name: IAMApp
table.description: Applications provided by Zoho, gives efficient UI for the customers to operate their data stored in Zoho. For example, Zoho Docs, Zoho Creator, and Zoho Reports.

column.name: APP_ID
column.description: Unique ID for service. Used for backward compatability.

column.name: APP_NAME
column.description: A string that identifies a service for inter service communications. It will also be used in i18n, rebranding, and licensing property keys. Usually, it will be same as the sub domain of the zoho.com site address.

column.name: DEFAULT_SUB_DOMAIN
column.description: The subdomain of zoho.com used to access this service. By default, the service name will be the sub domain. It can be changed in the operational environment by Organizations that rebrands Zoho.

column.name: DEFAULT_RO_SUB_DOMAIN
column.description: The subdomain of zoho.com of DR site in read only mode used to access this service.

column.name: APP_CODE
column.description: Unique code attribute for services.

column.name: ALIAS_NAME
column.description: Unique alias name for servicename. This is equivalent of servicename and can use this to generate authtoken and iscticket

column.name: HOME_PAGE
column.description: The home page of the service, where CS will redirect the user after login

column.name: ALLOW_REGISTRATION
column.description: Can a new user be registered to this service. Useful, during migration time

column.name: AUTO_REGISTRATION
column.description: Can a existing user of other Zoho service be registered to this service. Useful, during migration time

column.name: SERVICE_TYPE
column.description: Category based on usage: PRODUCTIVITY, COLLABORATION, BUSINESS, HELPDESK, FINANCE, HUMANRESOURCES

column.name: LISTING_ENABLED
column.description: Can be shown to other services' user on clicking Zoho Apps link

column.name: LISTING_ORDER
column.description: In which order it has to be listed along with other services

column.name: ENABLE_SSTICKET
column.description: Have a separate token for this service so that the token can not be used for accessing other services and vice versa. Sand boxing the service.

column.name: LOGO_URL
column.description: The URL of the logo of this service

column.name: IS_LOGINNAME_REQUIRED
column.description: Boolean to identify whether the app needs login name or not. If login name is required then IAM will redirect to the login name registration page.

column.name: REST_API_PATH
column.description: REST API Path(/<rest_servlet>/<context>/app/....) used to send the request orginated from other app to owner app. Ex: resource/accounts, api/contacts, etc.,

column.name: REST_SERVER
column.description: URL of the server Ex:(internal.accounts.zoho.com or contacts.zoho.com) which serves Resource api. Value in DEFAULT_SUB_DOMAIN will be taken. if RESOURCE_SERVER is NULL.

column.name: SERVICE
column.description: specifies which service the app belongs.

table.name: IAMAppAllowedMethods
table.description: Contains Details regarding the allowed Methods for the Services

column.name: METHOD_ID
column.description: Hashed Method Id

column.name: METHOD_NAME
column.description: Unique Method Id

table.name: IAMAppKeyStore
table.description: Holds Public Key for the app used to sign internal request

column.name: LABEL
column.description: Naming for key entry

column.name: PUBLIC_KEY
column.description: Public key used for ISC signature verification in producer side

table.name: IAMSystemOperation
table.description: Operations invoked by other APP's. For ex it might be resendConfirmationMail, getResetPasswordDigest etc.

column.name: OPERATION_ID
column.description: Unique ID for operation

column.name: OPERATION_NAME
column.description: Name of the Operation.

column.name: RESOURCE_URI
column.description: The URI on which the operation to be executed

column.name: OPERATION_PARAMS
column.description: Required params for the operation

column.name: OPERATION_STATUS
column.description: The status of the operation. Can 0-completed, 1-pending, 2-error

table.name: IAMAppConfiguration
table.description: Holds deployment specific configuration such as "cookie_name". Any hard coded (in the source code) system configurations should be moved to this table

column.name: CONFIG_NAME
column.description: Name of the configuration in dot notation format. For example, {feature}.{parameter}

column.name: CONFIG_VALUE
column.description: Value of the configuration. The value can be set during deployment and can be changed in run time from Zoho Accounts Admin Console

column.name: CONFIG_RO_VALUE
column.description: Value of the configuration in Read Only mode.

column.name: DEFAULT_VALUE
column.description: If not configured by the administrator

table.name: IAMAppRole
table.description: Classification of users based on the access privilages within the Zoho App. For example, "SupportAdmin", "SupportModerator" in the "Zoho Support" App.

column.name: ROLE_TYPE
column.description: IAM Equivalent role for AppAccount custom roles for OrgOAuth token creation (0 - User, 1 - Moderator, 2 - Admin)

table.name: IAMAppSystemRole
table.description: System roles like SASAdmin, IAMAdmin etc

column.name: ROLE_ID
column.description: A unique number. Added for backward compatibility

column.name: SYSTEM_ROLE_NAME
column.description: A unique string which identifies a role in a Zoho App.

table.name: IAMUserSystemRoles
table.description: System roles vs Users mapping

column.name: ZUID
column.description: The creator of this account

table.name: IAMAppLicense
table.description: Contains parameters that are used to restrict usage of particular App functions based licensing plans. For example, the usage in Docs is restricted based on storage space and number of users

column.name: LICENSE_ATTRIBUTE_KEY
column.description: In dot notation format. For example free, professional, business, professional.storage, business.users, etc.,

column.name: DEFAULT_VALUE
column.description: For example, for professional edition, default space give is 5GB

table.name: IAMScope
table.description: Scope vs Scope_Id. It is used to maintain the scopes and its description which will be used by the services.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: Unique ID of the scope

column.name: PARENT_SCOPE_ID
column.description: Parent scope ID of this scope

column.name: OPERATION_TYPE
column.description: Allowed operation type of scope

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the token is generated

table.name: IAMAppStatement
table.description: Contains HTML of the Sign In, Sign Up pages

table.name: IAMAppAnnouncement
table.description: announcement redirection

column.name: ANNOUNCEMENT_TYPE
column.description: This is a Bitset value of AnnouncementType, Announcement SupportType and StatusUpdate

column.name: PRIORITY
column.description: The order of displaying preannouncements based on priority

column.name: URL
column.description: The URL of this announcement

table.name: IAMDeploymentConfig
table.description: Holds app/deployment specific configuration

column.name: DEPLOYMENT_NAME
column.description: Name of the Deployment

column.name: CONFIG_NAME
column.description: Name of the configuration

table.name: IAMCacheCluster
table.description: Holds cache cluster configuration

column.name: CLUSTER_NAME
column.description: Name of the cache cluster

column.name: SYNC_CLUSTER_NAME
column.description: Name of the cache cluster to sync the data

column.name: IS_SYNC_ENABLED_FOR_GET
column.description: synchorize for get request

table.name: IAMClusterNode
table.description: Holds app specific cache configuration

column.name: NODE_NAME
column.description: Name of the cache node

column.name: CACHE_TYPE
column.description: Cache server type. Can be memcache or redis or some other

column.name: SERVER_IP_PORT
column.description: IP and Port details of the cache server

table.name: IAMClusterRange
table.description: Holds node specific range configuration

column.name: RANGE_NAME
column.description: Name of the range node

table.name: IAMScopeDescriptions
table.description: Scope vs Scope_Id. It is used to maintain the scopes and its description which will be used by the services.

column.name: OPERATION_TYPE
column.description: Unique ID of the scope

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: Unique ID of the scope

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the token is generated

column.name: MODIFIED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the token is generated

table.name: IAMSubScopes
table.description: Scope vs Scope_Id. It is used to maintain the scopes and its description which will be used by the services.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: Unique ID of the scope

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the token is generated

table.name: IAMMailDetails
table.description: Holds Public Key for the app used to sign internal request

column.name: CONNECTOR_NAME
column.description: Naming for key entry

column.name: CONNECTOR_KEY
column.description: Autentication key to connect mail server

column.name: CONNECTOR_ID
column.description: Autentication ID to connect mail server

column.name: DEFAULT_MAIL_FROM
column.description: Default mail from if not set in mail.

column.name: MAIL_SENDER_TYPE
column.description: Used if we use multiple type of mail.

table.name: IAMMailTypes
table.description: Holds Public Key for the app used to sign internal request

column.name: MAIL_TYPE_NAME
column.description: Naming for key entry

column.name: MAIL_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Autentication key to connect mail server

table.name: IAMMailSender
table.description: Holds Public Key for the app used to sign internal request

column.name: CONNECTOR_NAME
column.description: Naming for key entry

column.name: MAIL_SENDER
column.description: Autentication key to connect mail server

table.name: IAMShortenURL
table.description: Shorten urls for invitation urls for sms

column.name: SHORTEN_ID
column.description: shortern url for eg: /lz45rsA

column.name: URL
column.description: mapped url with full url value

table.name: IAMAppRoleOperations
table.description: Allowed Operations for a particular App-Role

table.name: IAMAppTemplate
table.description: To store templates of all services for announcement

table.name: IAMAppLanguages
table.description: Language table under app

table.name: IAMAppI18n
table.description: Localization of UI components of a Zoho App.

column.name: I18N_ATTRIBUTE_NAME
column.description: Internationalized Attribute Name as per the I18n Guidelines http://i18n/

column.name: I18N_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: The localized value of the I18N key

table.name: IAMBannerTemplateProps
table.description: To store App Template Banner properties

table.name: IAMMailTemplateProps
table.description: To store mail templates under App

column.name: FROM_ADDRESS
column.description: Will be used for Mail templates.

column.name: REPLY_TO_ADDRESS
column.description: Will be used for Mail templates.

table.name: IAMAuthenticationTokens
table.description: Maintains the token name vs value

column.name: TOKEN_NAME
column.description: Name of the token

column.name: TOKEN_VALUE
column.description: Token value

column.name: CLIENT_ID
column.description: Applicaton's client id value if any

column.name: CLIENT_SECRET
column.description: Encrypted client secret value

column.name: DC_INFO
column.description: The token belonged DC, if its inter DC token
